original: <color=#FFE787>使用限制：</color><color=#ccffcc>守城方可使用</color>  提升我方 <color=#ccffcc>400</color> 點士氣，並且無效敵方軍師技。
text: <color=#FFE787>Restrictions on use: </color><color=#ccffcc>Can be used only when defending the city</color> Boost our side <color=#ccffcc>400</color> A little morale and invalid enemy Fang military division skills.
